Training Started.description: A training of a Rasa machine learning model got started. The event provides information on aggregated training data statistics.

language.description: Language model is trained with, e.g. 'en'.

training_id.description: Generated unique identifier for this training.

type.description: Type of model trained, either 'nlu', 'core' or 'rasa'.

pipeline.description: List of the pipeline configurations used for training.

policies.description: List of the policy configurations used for training.

train_schema.description: Training graph schema for graph recipe

predict_schema.description: Predict graph schema for graph recipe

num_actions.description: Number of actions defined in the domain.

num_templates.description: Number of templates or responses defined in the domain.

num_conditional_response_variations.description: Number of conditional response variations defined in the domain.

num_slot_mappings.description: Number of total slot mappings defined in the domain.

num_custom_slot_mappings.description: Number of custom slot mappings defined in the domain.

num_conditional_slot_mappings.description: Number of slot mappings with conditions attached defined in the domain.

num_slots.description: Number of slots defined in the domain.

num_forms.description: Number of forms defined in the domain.

num_intents.description: Number of intents defined in the domain.

num_entities.description: Number of entities defined in the domain.

num_synonyms.description: Total number of entity synonyms defined.

is_finetuning.description: True if a model is trained by finetuning an existing model.

recipe.description: Recipe used in training the model, either 'default.v1' or 'graph.v1'.

Training Completed.description: The training of a Rasa machine learning model finished. The event provides information about the resulting model.

training_id.description: Generated unique identifier for this training. Can be used to join with 'Training Started'.

type.description: Type of model trained, either 'nlu', 'core' or 'rasa'.

runtime.description: The time in seconds it took to train the model.

Telemetry Disabled.description: Triggered when telemetry reporting gets disabled. Last event sent before disabling telemetry. This event is not sent, if the user never enabled telemetry reporting before deactivating it.

Training Data Split.description: Triggered when training data gets split.

fraction.description: Percentage of the data which goes into training data (the rest goes into the test set).

Training Data Validated.description: Triggered when training data gets validated.

Training Data Converted.description: Triggered when training data gets converted.

Tracker Exported.description: Triggered when conversations get exported from a tracker store through an event broker.

event_broker.description: Name of the used event broker

tracker_store.description: Name of the used tracker store

number_of_exported_events.description: Number of events exported through the event broker

Interactive Learning Started.description: Triggered when an interactive learning session got started.

skip_visualization.description: Whether the visualization of stories should be shown during the interactive learning session

save_in_e2e.description: Whether the data should be stored in end-to-end format

Server Started.description: Triggered when a Rasa Open Source server gets started.

input_channels.description: Names of the used input channels

api_enabled.description: Indicator if the API is enabled or if only the input channel is running

number_of_workers.description: Amount of Sanic workers started as part of the server

endpoints_nlg.description: Type of the used NLG endpoint

endpoints_nlu.description: Type of the used NLU endpoint

endpoints_action_server.description: Type of the used action server

endpoints_model_server.description: Type of the used model server

endpoints_tracker_store.description: Type of the used tracker store

endpoints_lock_store.description: Type of the used lock store

endpoints_event_broker.description: Type of the used event broker

project.description: Hash of the deployed model the server is started with

Project Created.description: Triggered when a project is created using rasa init.

init_directory.description: Hash of the directory path the project is created in

Shell Started.description: Triggered when a shell session is started to talk to a trained bot.

type.description: Type of the model, either 'nlu', 'core' or 'rasa'.

Rasa X Local Started.description: Triggered when a Rasa X is started in local mode.

Story Visualization Started.description: Triggered when stories are getting visualized.

Model Core Tested.description: Triggered when a Core model is getting tested.

project.description: Fingerprint of the project the tested model got trained in.

num_story_steps.description: Number of story steps used for testing

end_to_end.description: Indicates if tests are running in end-to-end mode, testing message handling and dialogue handling at the same time

Model NLU Tested.description: Triggered when an NLU model is getting tested.

num_synonyms.description: Total number of entity synonyms defined.

Markers Extraction Initiated.description: Triggered when marker extraction has been initiated.

strategy.description: Strategy to use when selecting trackers to extract from.

only_extract.description: Indicates if path to write out statistics hasn't been specified.

seed.description: The seed to initialise the random number generator for use with the 'sample' strategy.

count.description: Number of trackers to extract from (for any strategy except 'all').

Markers Extracted.description: Triggered when markers have been extracted.

Markers Parsed.description: Triggered when markers have been successfully parsed.

max_depth.description: Maximum depth of the parsed markers.

branching_factor.description: Maximum number of children of any of the parsed markers.

Markers Statistics Computed.description: Triggered when marker statistics have been computed.

End-to-End Testing Started.description: Triggered when end-to-end testing has been started.

number_of_test_cases.description: Number of test cases to be run.

uses_fixtures.description: Indicates if any fixtures have been defined globally.
